trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the deletion of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event handler, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Å avbryte slettingen av en rad i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>hendelsesbehandling, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bruker den `dataGridViewRow` parameterverdien initialisere verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row the user is deleting.
Gets the row that the user is deleting.
The row that the user deleted.
